blog.name: 80swonderqueen
blog.title: I simultaneously love and hate everything 💛🖤💛

tags: fantastic beats and where to find them
summary: the day that gave me hope
body:
the day that gave me hope

hey did i ever tell u about that time in my first year of secondary school when a wizards duel broke out in the canteen?

little 12 year old me was just minding my own business when all of a sudden 2 girls wearing griffindor scarves jumped up with wands in hand and started screaming. immediately 5 or 6 girls in bin bag cloaks ran in through 3 separate entrances and started yelling curses at each other. the scarf girls stood on a table in the middle of the canteen - completely crammed full of speechless onlookers - screamed “expecto patronum!”, wands outstretched and we stood there and watched in awe as the bin bag dementors fled the scene. no one ever said anything about it or explained what it was but I will always remember it as the most random thing that I have ever witnessed.

blog.name: imaginationssz
blog.title: 100% pure-fangirl
blog.description: 70% SPN. 25%BTS 10% HP (yes! I give 105%) Misha Collins is the love of my life. You! Yeah, you, the one that is reading this. I gotta say thank you for visiting my blog and you are beautiful. Don't let anyone else tell you different. Feel free to ask me anything and don't be afraid to say Hi! 😁🙋 Link to Masterlist

summary: Hi! Would you mind writing aan reaction with how the boys from Harry Potter would propose to you ? Btw, I love your work! 😘
question: Hi! Would you mind writing aan reaction with how the boys from Harry Potter would propose to you ? Btw, I love your work! 😘
answer:
Oh, my God! You’re so cute and that’s so nice of you. Of course I would do that! Hope you like it 😘

Proposing to you

I think I’m gonna do it with these only three.

Masterlist

Enjoy :)

Harry Potter

This gif!!! I’m sorry if it isn’t like the things I’m about to say, but still… I love it

I think that it would be really spontaneous. Maybe, it could be in the library, while the two of you were looking for some books to help you figure out some mysterious things that were happening in the school. He would bring you so many books because he didn’t know what to actually look for. He put them in front of you with a loud noise. You were used to him being so childish so you didn’t even looked at him. He than moved from his place and got around the corner. You stopped your reading and the thought of the fact that you were both in the last year and that you were the girlfriend of the Golden Boy brought a smile on your lips.

“Y/N” Harry called for you. “Would you mind helping he with getting those books? I don’t know which one of them to choose.” You stood up and went to the place where the voice called to you.

As you went around the corner you saw your boyfriend in one knee. You thought that he fell and you joked a little. “Did the Golden Boy, lost something?” You said with your lips curved into a smile.

“Actually, I wanted to ask you something…” He took out of his pocket a small red box. “…Will you make me the happiest wizard and will you be my wife?”

You were too shocked to say anything, but still, your humor didn’t let you be.

“And why would I say yas?” You asked with a laugh.

“Because I’m the Chosen One.” He said with a smile on his beautiful lips.

“Hhmm… Than… Yes!!” He stood up and raised you from the ground and spun you around.

Draco Malfoy

I think that he wold be so stressed about it, tbh. He would have everything planned to the last detail.

I believe that the bouth of you would be at his house because his parents left for the weekend to go see some so-called friends. It didn’t matter to him. All he knew was that that ment that he could be alone with you for a few days.

He sent you a letter as soon as he found out that his parents would leave. Of course, he didn’t say anything about his plan in the letter, he just said it was because he wanted to move some things and he needed “a feminine eye”. You said yes, of course, and went to see him.

He was waiting for you in the door frame. As soon as you saw him, you dropped your things and ran to him. He coughed you and lifted you from the ground and spun you.

“I’m so happy that you came.” He said as he put you down.

“I’m happy that you invited me here, dear.” You said as you pressed a small kiss on his lips. He smiled sweetly at you. You loved the fact that the big and bad Draco Malfoy was so sweet and cute with you and that he would put a curse on someone of they even dare to frighten you.

Both of you entered the house and went to his room. As you made your way upstairs you saw a lot of portraits of him and his family. It was kind of scary, but, somehow nice.

As you enetered the room, you couldn’t help but to notice that the room was completely clean and you didn’t see any boxes or something.

“OK, sweety, let’s get started.” He Saud as he intertwined his hands. He started speaking how he wants to move some chair or some desk. As he spoke, he made his way to you and placed his hands on your hips and pulled you into his chest.

His voice was sooo calm and it was so sweet to listen to what he had to say. He than suddenly took his hands off your hips and you turned around just to see the sweet little Draco in one if his knees and holding a little box with a ring in it. He cleared his throat and spoke.

“Y/N, would you…” He began, but you couldn’t wait any longer. You jumped in his arms and hugged him tightly.

“Yes! Yes! Of course, yes!” You screamed.

Ron Weasley

I believe that in this situation, it would be something suddenly and unexpected. I mean…

I think that it would happen in the most unexpected way.

One day, while the entire Weasley family reunited, Ron sent you a letter in which he was asking if you could, maybe, come over, because it’s not too often that the entire family comes together.

Of course, you said yes. You loved Ron, you always did and all you wanted was to see him happy. Plus, you loved the idea of you meeting the entire family. It was cute.

As you got there, you were amazed by the noise that came from the house. Everyone was going in another direction and everyone had their own things to do. For you, meeting such a big family was amazing because you are an only child and you never had a brother or sister to be there for you, day and night.

As Ron brought you in the house, safe and sound with the family car, everyone stopped what they were doing and looked at you. It was as if the time stopped in place. You started feeling strange because all those eyes were looking at you like they were expecting you to do something… Anything.

“Hi~” you said as you waved at all of them with a big smile on your face. Suddenly, the noise started again and everyone came at you and started hugging you and saying that you were beautiful and so sweet. You could hear Fred, telling his brother “And she is real. Where did you find her, Ron?” He said with a big laugh, teasing him.

“Oook, guys! Leave her be!” Said Ron’s mother that looked at you with heart eyes. You could tell that she liked you.

The entire day was full of tasks and everybody had to do something. You liked it. You really liked it there. Plus, you were close to Ron. You were in tge back of the house, just the two of you, gardening.

“Hey, Ron!” You called for him. “Can you hand me a shovel, dear?”

“Sure, honey… Just a second!” He said.

You heard him approaching you and you turned to get the shovel that you needed. But, instead of the shovel you saw a little box in his hand and he looked at you, scared to say anything.

“You… I mean, me.. I wanted to… know if you…?” He couldn’t find his words and kept looking at you and than at the little box and that back at you. You couldn’t help but smile at the sight of your boyfriend trying to propose to you, but being awful at it.

“I think that… What you wanted to say was…?” You tried to help him. “Would you marry me?” He finally said.

“Yes! Of course, yes!” You said as you hugged him. Suddenly the noise was back again and the entire Weasley family came out of nowhere and raised you from the ground, screaming out of joy. You loved that family!!

Both of you entered the house and went to his room. As you made your way upstairs you saw a lot of portraits of him and his family. It was kind of scary, but, somehow nice.

As you enetered the room, you couldn’t help but to notice that the room was completely clean and you didn’t see any boxes or something.

“OK, sweety, let’s get started.” He Saud as he intertwined his hands. He started speaking how he wants to move some chair or some desk. As he spoke, he made his way to you and placed his hands on your hips and pulled you into his chest.

His voice was sooo calm and it was so sweet to listen to what he had to say. He than suddenly took his hands off your hips and you turned around just to see the sweet little Draco in one if his knees and holding a little box with a ring in it. He cleared his throat and spoke.

“Y/N, would you…” He began, but you couldn’t wait any longer. You jumped in his arms and hugged him tightly.

“Yes! Yes! Of course, yes!” You screamed.

Ron Weasley

I believe that in this situation, it would be something suddenly and unexpected. I mean…

I think that it would happen in the most unexpected way.

One day, while the entire Weasley family reunited, Ron sent you a letter in which he was asking if you could, maybe, come over, because it’s not too often that the entire family comes together.

Of course, you said yes. You loved Ron, you always did and all you wanted was to see him happy. Plus, you loved the idea of you meeting the entire family. It was cute.

As you got there, you were amazed by the noise that came from the house. Everyone was going in another direction and everyone had their own things to do. For you, meeting such a big family was amazing because you are an only child and you never had a brother or sister to be there for you, day and night.

As Ron brought you in the house, safe and sound with the family car, everyone stopped what they were doing and looked at you. It was as if the time stopped in place. You started feeling strange because all those eyes were looking at you like they were expecting you to do something… Anything.

“Hi~” you said as you waved at all of them with a big smile on your face. Suddenly, the noise started again and everyone came at you and started hugging you and saying that you were beautiful and so sweet. You could hear Fred, telling his brother “And she is real. Where did you find her, Ron?” He said with a big laugh, teasing him.

“Oook, guys! Leave her be!” Said Ron’s mother that looked at you with heart eyes. You could tell that she liked you.

The entire day was full of tasks and everybody had to do something. You liked it. You really liked it there. Plus, you were close to Ron. You were in tge back of the house, just the two of you, gardening.

“Hey, Ron!” You called for him. “Can you hand me a shovel, dear?”

“Sure, honey… Just a second!” He said.

You heard him approaching you and you turned to get the shovel that you needed. But, instead of the shovel you saw a little box in his hand and he looked at you, scared to say anything.

“You… I mean, me.. I wanted to… know if you…?” He couldn’t find his words and kept looking at you and than at the little box and that back at you. You couldn’t help but smile at the sight of your boyfriend trying to propose to you, but being awful at it.

“I think that… What you wanted to say was…?” You tried to help him. “Would you marry me?” He finally said.

“Yes! Of course, yes!” You said as you hugged him. Suddenly the noise was back again and the entire Weasley family came out of nowhere and raised you from the ground, screaming out of joy. You loved that family!!

summary: Up in Smoke: a marauders era rp To deny the war became impossible the day the Death Eaters attacked Diagon Alley. It happened in...
caption:
Up in Smoke: a marauders era rp

To deny the war became impossible the day the Death Eaters attacked Diagon Alley. It happened in the middle of day, in August while Hogwarts students were shopping for supplies and families were enjoying their morning. Seven killed and a dozen more injured. Peace in the wizarding world was over, ambivalence no longer an option. To the Death Eaters, you are one of them or you are the enemy. To fight against them paints a target on your back.

Even so, there are some who have chosen to fight - whether they a part of Dumbledore’s only whispered of group, the Order, or if they are finding some other way of resisting. They dream of a better world than this one, and they are not afraid to fight for that world - whatever the cost may be.

This is not the same world the Marauders knew when they were at Hogwarts. 1979 does not hold any of the sheltered hallways of their school days. There are questions of how much of the Dark Lord has infiltrated the ministry and the only thing you can trust in the papers are the obituaries. The illusion of safety is gone, and it is time to pick a side. War is burning, and you must decide where you stand.

More than just the illusion will go up in smoke.

Main ll Owls ll App Form ll Characters ll Map
